!Arujien: If I tell you her name, you must give me your word that you will not reveal it -- I would sooner die than embarrass her publicly! Well... Her name is *Greenis*. Even saying her name aloud makes my heart beat faster! But I must know if she has feelings for me as well. If she does not, I won't burden her with my love.
Will you help me? [Quest _002_WhatWomenWant quest_accept|Say yes.]
